body_html:
(Probably worth linking this with #15290)

@peastman : If you're interested, it's probably worth discussing this on the "build" group at https://www.tensorflow.org/community/lists#special_interest_groups
Since there you will find a community of folks interested in figuring out the appropriate packaging story.

Thanks for your interest!
